description.displayText: Devin has worked with our family for almost 2 years, caring for our daughter from the time she was born until now and caring for our son since he was a year old. She is a delightful and talented person, and an incredibly caring, creative, and resourceful caregiver for children! We have found her to be reliable, communicative, respectful, and tactful. She demonstrates good judgment and attention to detail about our children's needs. Our children absolutely adore her and become deeply engrossed in imaginative play with her. She is an incredible artist and has greatly enhanced their enjoyment and appreciation of art. I give her credit for helping them to build a sense of humor as well! Devin is a very special person and we are lucky to have found her!

description.displayText: Devin was incredible with my two children from the time they were babies until around age ten. Devin navigated the city of Chicago with my kids incredibly.  She always had an adventure or project ready for my kids.  She would inspire them to walk a great deal to experience many city things.  Devin is great about keeping in touch with our kids.  My children still bring up fond memories of their experiences with Devin.  Devin is highly recommended.

description.displayText: Devin cared for our children like she was their own. She is responsible, fun, and dedicated. The absolute perfect mix of playful (for the kids) and reliable (for the parents).
